info.title: Azure SQL Database API spec
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases.

get.description: Returns information about the Azure SQL capabilities available for the specified region.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The name of the region for which the Azure SQL capabilities are retrieved.

limit.description: The maximum size of the database (see 'unit' for the units).

unit.description: The units that the limit is expressed in.

status.description: The status of the maximum size capability.

MaxSizeCapability.description: Represents the maximum size limits for an Azure SQL Database.

name.description: The Service Objective name (Eg: S0, S1, S2).

status.description: The status of the Service Objective.

id.description: The unique ID of the Service Objective.

supportedMaxSizes.description: The list of supported maximum Azure SQL Database sizes for this Service Objective.

ServiceObjectiveCapability.description: Represents the Service Objectives capabilities. The service objective represents the performance level assigned to the database (eg: S0, P2, Basic, ...). See https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/sql-database-service-tiers/ for more info

name.description: The edition name (eg: Basic, Standard, Premium, ...).

status.description: The status of the Azure SQL Database edition.

supportedServiceLevelObjectives.description: The list of supported Service Objectives for the edition.

EditionCapability.description: Represents the Azure SQL Server edition capabilities. This represents the service tier of the database (Eg: Basic, Standard, Premium, ...).

status.description: The status of the Azure SQL Server version.

supportedEditions.description: The list of supported Azure SQL Server editions.

ServerVersionCapability.description: Represents the Azure SQL Server capabilities.

status.description: The status for the region with respect to Azure SQL.

supportedServerVersions.description: The list of supported Azure SQL Server versions.

LocationCapability.description: Represents the Azure SQL capabilities for a region.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription id that identifies an Azure subscription.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the Resource Group to which the resource belongs.

ServerNameParameter.name: serverName
ServerNameParameter.description: The name of the Azure SQL Server
